attributes.action: Take into account financial settlement in court divorce proceedings when assessing CSA payments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present there is no link between financial provisions resulting from divorce proceedings at court and CSA payments.
My experience is £85.000 to provide accommodation for my children and I also have to pay CSA which is unfair.
The financial provisions made at court should be taken in to account when assessing CSA payments.
